alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:58AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fulton and western Tazewell Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cuba, or 7 miles west of Canton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. David around 310 AM CDT. Canton around 315 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for west central Illinois. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Illinois.
